Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to requiring the chairman of the state liquor authority to make certain quarterly reports
Summary: Requires the chairman of the state liquor authority to make quarterly reports to the governor and the legislature of the authority's enforcement activities for the preceding quarter.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the alcoholic beverage control law, in relation to requiring the chairman of the state liquor authority to make certain quarterly reports
